author: TingLiu6
body: Could you please help to review? --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/899)

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 6 unresolved discussions.

---

_[test/powershell/Get-Random.Tests.ps1, line 4 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/899#-KGmeuZfcIz6FGGSAY9Z:-KGmeuZfcIz6FGGSAY9_:1700947511) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/84e648e6c51d66c051a64431584428569a2d9108/test/powershell/Get-Random.Tests.ps1#L4)):_
Instead of the value that's passed for parameters, the name should convey the reason for the test. For example:
Positive maximum number, Both negative etc. 

---

_[test/powershell/Get-Random.Tests.ps1, line 5 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/899#-KGmeoAuahaOE0YuZMbb:-KGmeoAuahaOE0YuZMbc:-1642065083) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/84e648e6c51d66c051a64431584428569a2d9108/test/powershell/Get-Random.Tests.ps1#L5)):_
This is redundant with the test for 100.

---

_[test/powershell/Get-Random.Tests.ps1, line 63 [r3]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/899#-KGmfmsr_hIPg2aYyQXp:-KGmfmsr_hIPg2aYyQXq:-245079215) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/84e648e6c51d66c051a64431584428569a2d9108/test/powershell/Get-Random.Tests.ps1#L63)):_
Should not use Should Throw but verify the fullyqualified error id. Example:

$testDataForError = @(
            @{ Name = 'Min and Max are same throws error'; Maximum = 20; Minimum = 20}
    )

```
It "get a correct random number for '<Name>'" -TestCases $testDataForError {
    try 
    {
        Get-Random -Maximum 20 -Minimum 20 -ErrorAction Stop            
        throw "OK"
    }
    catch
    {
        $_.FullyQualifiedErrorId | Should Be 'MinGreaterThanOrEqualMax,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetRandomCommand'
    }
}
```

---
